metadata.title: CVE-2023-4244 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's netfilter: nf_tablescomponent can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. Due to arace condition between nf_tables netlink control plane transaction andnft_set element garbage collection, it is possible to underflow thereference counter causing a use-after-free vulnerability. We recommendupgrading past commit 3e91b0ebd994635df2346353322ac51ce84ce6d8.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
